channel.title: Comments on: A quick China memory: The African I found in Shangqiu

item.title: By: Amy Bugg Burke
item.dc:creator: Amy Bugg Burke
item.description: Great one Will - I had forgotten all about this. I hope that fancy school knows how lucky they would be to have you as their student. Good luck and Merry Christmas and Happy New Year! We love you and miss you!
item.content:encoded: Great one Will – I had forgotten all about this. I hope that fancy school knows how lucky they would be to have you as their student. Good luck and Merry Christmas and Happy New Year! We love you and miss you!
